The video below introduces the `shiny` package. This package allows for us to make interactive web-based applications that can run `R` code dynamically! These can be great ways to allow users to explore your data, model, etc.

I highly recommend watching the video using the 'full' Panopto player. There is a 'pop out' button in the bottom right of the video to enter this viewer.
